description: Volkswagen, a company on a quest to become the world's largest automaker, reports earnings today. What do the proposed federal budgets of House Republicans and Senate Democrats have in common? And J.C. Penney seriously needs to catch a break right now. Shoppers were scared off when the chain eliminated big sales in favor of everyday low prices. Now, Penney's will open 681 'Joe Fresh' shops inside of their main stores.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, March 14, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, March 14, 2013
teaser: Volkswagen, a company on a quest to become the world's largest automaker, reports earnings today. What do the proposed federal budgets of House Republicans and Senate Democrats have in common? And J.C. Penney seriously needs to catch a break right now. Shoppers were scared off when the chain eliminated big sales in favor of everyday low prices. Now, Penney's will open 681 'Joe Fresh' shops inside of their main stores.
byline: Queena Kim, Jonathan Zittrain, David Brancaccio, Sally Herships, Bill Zeeble, Chris Farrell, Scott Tong, Diane Swonk, Monica McGrath and Jeremy Hobson
